markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11+"
    pfs=""
>
[Darkwood Weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=376)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 599 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by weapon

**Bulk**  varies by weapon
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Darkwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=273)

</column>

---

Darkwood weapons are as dark as ebony, with a slight purple tint. A darkwood weapon’s Bulk is reduced by 1 (or to light Bulk if its normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a weapon that normally has light Bulk).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Darkwood Weapon (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 599 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp (+140 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** at least 175 gp of darkwood + 17.5 gp per Bulk

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Darkwood Weapon (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 599 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 13,500 gp (+1,350 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** at least 6,750 gp of darkwood + 675 gp per Bulk
name: Darkwood Weapon (High-Grade)
